name: Give Me Your (Purple) Heart: A Vincent Dating Sim
name_original: Give Me Your (Purple) Heart: A Vincent Dating Sim
description:
Have you ever wanted to date Vincent-- the FAN interpretation of purple guy from way back in the day? Well now you can!! 

You play as a lonely person on Valentine's Day who runs into Vincent in a store. Hijinks ensue. 

GAME IS 16+!!! RATED SO FOR SEXUAL CONVERSATIONS AND CURSING AS WELL AS VIOLENCE BUT NO ACTUAL INTERCOURSE OCCURING!!! 

CREDITS: 

Jane Art in the shop by hachiya_x on instagram!! 

Fnaf 1 stage and party room model- I tried to find the original poster, but couldn't. It seems it was a GMOD map made awhile ago! 

Vincent Yass Sprite- I couldn't for the LIFE of me find the original artist, which is so upsetting. So sorry! 

Music- FNAF 2 It's Been So Long Remastered 8-Bit Chiptune Remix by 8 Bit Planet on Youtube! 

Also, the game is pretty jank! I made it in about 4~5 days for a friend after having never used Ren'py a day in my life, and it definitely shows! So, if you happen to find this...haha! Sorry?
